trans-unit.source: Supplies base class implementation for all activity designer theme classes used in a workflow design-time environment.
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別實作的工作流程設計階段環境中使用的所有活動設計工具主題類別。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All classes that supply theme property settings to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> classes must inherit from the DesignerTheme class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供主題屬性設定，以<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>類別必須繼承自 DesignerTheme 類別</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>的所有類別

trans-unit.source: Designer themes provide a set of property values with which to display background and foreground colors and styles, fonts, and other style settings for the designer classes displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主題提供一組用來顯示背景和前景色彩和樣式、 字型和樣式的其他設定工作流程設計介面上顯示的設計工具類別的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> class also inherits from DesignerTheme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>類別也繼承自 DesignerTheme。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> class by using a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>類別使用<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> with which the designer theme is associated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref>與設計工具主題相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定設計工具主題要套用之設計工具類型的非限定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The ApplyTo property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer.
trans-unit.target: ApplyTo 屬性使用設計工具的型別，不合格的名稱與設計工具關聯的設計工具主題時<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A>屬性將產生關聯，設計工具主題與設計工具的型別使用<xref:System.Type>設計工具。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.DesignerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the designer type to which the designer theme is applied.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具主題要套用之設計工具類型的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者嘗試設定作業時<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow theme that encapsulates the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 取得封裝設計工具主題的工作流程主題。

trans-unit.source: The ContainingTheme property returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> object that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> used during initialization.
trans-unit.target: ContainingTheme 屬性會傳回<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>物件<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>在初始化期間使用。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"> </xref>物件相關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the designer associated with the designer theme.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與設計工具主題相關聯的設計工具類型。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerType property associates the designer theme with a designer type by using the <xref:System.Type> of the designer, while the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> property associates the designer theme with a designer by using the unqualified name of the designer type.
trans-unit.target: DesignerType 屬性將產生關聯，設計工具主題與設計工具的型別使用<xref:System.Type>的設計工具中，雖然<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A>屬性將產生關聯，設計工具主題與設計工具使用設計工具的型別非限定的名稱。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ApplyTo%2A> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Possible values for this property include <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, and any classes created by activity designer developers that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的可能值包括<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>， <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>，以及繼承自<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>的活動設計工具開發人員建立的任何類別</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner></xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the designer to be associated with the current designer theme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>，代表要與目前設計工具主題相關聯的設計工具。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A user attempted a set operation when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*> property was set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者嘗試設定作業時<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.ReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> to attempt to free resources and perform other clean-up operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 可讓<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Finalize releases only unmanaged resources prior to garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 版本只有 unmanaged 的資源在記憶體回收前完成程序。

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those performed by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 會執行進一步的初始化工作所執行的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> class provides no default behavior for this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>類別，此方法會提供任何預設行為。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> must provide their own logic for this method.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>必須為這個方法提供自己的邏輯。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer theme class that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知設計工具主題類別設計工具的環境屬性設定已變更。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> use this method to make necessary changes when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration value changes from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>使用這個方法來進行必要時變更<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>列舉值的變更從<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>或<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty><xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>至<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>列舉型別決定設計工具主題取得其環境屬性設定的位置。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>值時，設計工具主題類別取得其環境的設定，從<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>值時，設計工具主題類別取得其環境設定，從設計工具會在其安裝作業系統。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value that the designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"> </xref>設計工具主題現在應使用的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the designer theme is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出設計工具主題是否為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> that the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> is initialized with is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), ReadOnly obtains its value from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>，<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme>初始化與不是 null 參考 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，ReadOnly 取得其值從<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is a null reference (`Nothing`), ReadOnly is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>為 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，是 ReadOnly `false`。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme> is assigned to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, the ReadOnly property is set to `true`, and properties on all designer themes associated with this theme cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>指派給<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，ReadOnly 屬性設定為`true`，且無法變更這個主題相關聯的所有設計工具主題上的屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme>

trans-unit.source: If required, properties can be set after loading the theme but before assigning it to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 之後載入佈景主題，但之前將其指派至<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.CurrentTheme%2A> ，必要時，可以設定屬性

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme"></xref>是唯讀，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 執行與釋出、 釋放或重設 unmanaged 的資源相關聯的應用程式定義工作。

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個版本的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。</xref:System.IDisposable> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTheme.System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>
